questions.question: This type of system monitors network traffic for suspicious activity and alerts administrators.
questions.answer: What is an Intrusion Detection System (IDS)?

questions.question: This type of IDS analyzes network traffic patterns to detect anomalies.
This term refers to the practice of comparing network traffic to known attack signatures to detect intrusions.
This type of IDS is installed on individual devices to monitor and analyze incoming and outgoing traffic.
This open-source IDS is widely used for network intrusion detection and prevention.
